alert.note: Alert for Routt (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 12:52PM MDT until further notice by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Elk River at Milner affecting Routt County. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack and increase river and stream flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elk River at Milner. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, water is nearing ranch buildings between County Road 44 and the Elk River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM MDT Monday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 7.8 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
